18212096.admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia

repnme.cdata!: Portugal - Second Banco de Fomento Nacional Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of the Second Banco de
            Fomento Nacional Project are: (i) to support the development
            of medium-sized economically viable industrial projects in
            the private and mixed sector enterprises with special
            emphasis on encouraging industries with export potential;
            (ii) to assist BFN in strengthening its export investment
            promotion and service capabilities; (iii) to contribute to
            Portugal's industrial restructuring in preparation for
            entry into the European Economic Community (EEC); and (iv)
            to improve BFN's arrears position.

docna.cdata!: Portugal - Second Banco de Fomento Nacional Project

display_title.display_title:
Portugal - Second Banco de
            Fomento Nacional Project
